title: Durban school principal accused of forcing teachers to undress before touching and kissing
text:
Teaching and learning was stopped on Monday at a primary school in a suburb of Durban, by protesting leaders of the Simunye branch of the South African Democratic Teachers' Union (Sadtu).

It is alleged that he summoned female teachers to his office, forcing them to undress before touching and kissing them.

Principal on the run

On Thursday, the Sadtu members demanded a meeting with the women staff at the school. While they met with the teachers, the principal told them he was diabetic and had to go out to get something to eat. He has not returned to the school, she said.

"The principal was supposed to be suspended before schools reopened last week. We are yet to investigate why it never happened," said Mthembu.

description: Teaching and learning has been interrupted at a primary school in a suburb of Durban, following allegations that the school principal has been sexually abusing female teachers.
